quote: No, I don't benefit. I don't benefit.
quotePlain: No, I don’t benefit. I don’t benefit.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: Trump's refusal to release his tax returns makes it impossible to quantify exactly how much he would personally benefit from his policy proposals. But what is known about Trump's past patterns of taxation and his income and wealth holdings strongly suggest that at least three proposed changes -- to the alternative minimum tax, to the tax on "passthrough" income, and to the estate tax -- would benefit Trump or his family either immediately or down the road.
checks.quotePlain: Trump’s refusal to release his tax returns makes it impossible to quantify exactly how much he would personally benefit from his policy proposals. But what is known about Trump’s past patterns of taxation and his income and wealth holdings strongly suggest that at least three proposed changes – to the alternative minimum tax, to the tax on “passthrough” income, and to the estate tax – would benefit Trump or his family either immediately or down the road.

claims.title: Trump wouldn't benefit from GOP tax plan
claims.negative: Trump would almost certainly benefit from GOP tax plan
claims.negativePlain: Trump would almost certainly benefit from GOP tax plan
claims.truth: Since he hasn't released his taxes it's difficult to analyze this, but his leaked 2005 returns show he would definitely benefit from abolishing the AMT, and his heirs would benefit from abolishing the estate tax.
claims.truthPlain: Since he hasn’t released his taxes it’s difficult to analyze this, but his leaked 2005 returns show he would definitely benefit from abolishing the AMT, and his heirs would benefit from abolishing the estate tax.
